Job Description: Role:   Software Development Engineer for Testing (SDET)   5- 8 Yrs   Requirements:     Should have more than 5 years of experience in Software Test Automation.     Should have experience in designing and developing Test Automation Frameworks on multiple application platforms like Web, Mobile, and Desktop.     Should have experience in writing Automation test code in C# and utilizing industry standard tools such as Selenium, Postman etc.     Should have experience in working with BDD framework using SpecFlow.     Should have proficiency with all automated testing types Unit, Functional, Load, Behavioural, Integration.     Should have knowledge of Web and Windows technologies, including webservices, Windows Services, REST API, etc.     Experience in SQL and understanding of database concepts.     Experience in working with CI/CD pipeline.     Working experience in Agile testing methodologies and best practices      Should be able to build different test scenarios and acceptance tests.     Should be able to set up, maintain, and operate test automation frameworks.
